member.name: T:DeenGames.Utils.AStarPathFinder.PathFinderHelper
member.summary: Not actually used by the real PathFinder code, but created by Deen Games so we can easily reference path-finder tile values.

member.name: M:DeenGames.Utils.AStarPathFinder.PriorityQueueB`1.Push(`0)
member.summary: Push an object onto the PQ
member.returns: The index in the list where the object is _now_. This will change when objects are taken from or put onto the PQ.

member.name: M:DeenGames.Utils.AStarPathFinder.PriorityQueueB`1.Pop
member.summary: Get the smallest object and remove it.

member.name: M:DeenGames.Utils.AStarPathFinder.PriorityQueueB`1.Update(System.Int32)
member.summary: Notify the PQ that the object at position i has changed and the PQ needs to restore order. Since you dont have access to any indexes (except by using the explicit IList.this) you should not call this function without knowing exactly what you do.
member.param: The index of the changed object.

member.name: M:DeenGames.Utils.AStarPathFinder.PriorityQueueB`1.Peek
member.summary: Get the smallest object without removing it.
